relation: Darrow1 - #79 Setting out for Grapefruit Falls, one fateful encounter stands between Ness and eternal peace of mind. Was it...really just a dream?

Darrow1 - #80 The long wait begins. As much as Giygas is the embodiment of evil, nothing could be worse for Ness than having to sit still for three whole minutes in real time. It may not seem like much, but with the game time to real world conversion, that's about 300 years.
Darrow1 - #81 The worst page ever? Just wait until the gardening story arc.
Darrow1 - #82 Although Ness fully believes Reginald is out to get him, the mouse has gone on record stating that he cares about and listens to everything Ness has to say! Honest.
Darrow1 - #83 After failing to get through the normal way, Paula's prayer brings a much needed solution.
textBeforeTable: > T P O I F D C A < Other Submissions by Darrow Titanic Ant says his farewell, or at least tries to. Also, Ness finally makes it to his first sanctuary.
